name: Pacomix 2
overview: An updated version of the original Pacomix. A puzzle game where you must collect all the items in an area, however once you head in a direction, you will keep going until you hit a wall or a reflector item. Now you must discover how to get all items with these limitations and then get to the exit to the next level. The second part of the game Pacomix, where the main character is again a fat, round... ahem... let's say a donut (well, how would you describe the Pacman character??), who again has the task of passing all the levels, collecting a certain number of objects.
